description: You can tell this CBM is meant to be installed around your eyes, but what exactly it will do, you have no idea.
A set of Ohuicatlachiyaliztimeh, this CBM uses matrix technology to detect hostility from nearby targets, acting as an infallible IFF.
An extremely-efficent form of bionic power storage, using integral matrix dust to increase the efficiency of possible storage multiple times.
A connection between the user's metabolism and their power storage allows this CBM to convert burned calories into bionic energy.
A series of implants along the skeleton and in major muscle groups allow a dramatic increase in the user's strength and agility.
Implants under the skin throughout the body that bend light when activated, making it much harder to spot the user from a distance.
